explaintw:
優秀的射手往往可以把握每次的出手機會，百發百中的精準神射，給對手致命一擊。

[F0FF00]發動條件：我方持球＆達到士氣要求[-]
[F0FF00]發動限制：符合發動範圍[-]
[F0FF00]發動效果：100%投籃命中[-]
explaincn:
發射百發百中的超大號的三分球，得分後將在時間內造成全體對手投籃命中率大減。

[F0FF00]觸發方式：點擊發動[-]
explainen:
An excellent shooter grasp every shoot, give the opponent a fatal blow with a 100% shooting acucuracy godlike ability.


[F0FF00] Criteria: Reach morale requirentments and have possesion of the ball [-]
[F0FF00] Conditions: Be on shooting range [-]
[F0FF00] Effect: 100% shooting accuracy [-]

[F0FF00]發動條件：達到士氣要求[-]
[F0FF00]發動效果：對手在範圍內降低控球及無法投籃

在三分線外施放結界，只要敵方球員進入結界內將大幅降低控球值，並無法跳躍或射籃
[F0FF00]觸發時機：士氣值達到需求[-]
[F0FF00]觸發方式：點擊發動[-]
explainen:
The trap is activated outside the 3 point line, when opponents enter the trap it  will significantly reduce their ball handling ability and they won't be ablo to jump or shoot baskets.

[F0FF00] Effect: Lower Opponents Chances of Succesfully Shooting.
